subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Joe Flacco threw three touchdown passes, Haloti Ngata led an inspired defense that forced a team-record seven turnovers, and the host Ravens rolled to a 35-7 manhandling of the Steelers.
snippet: Joe Flacco threw three touchdown passes, Haloti Ngata led an inspired defense that forced a team-record seven turnovers, and the host Ravens rolled to a 35-7 manhandling of the Steelers.
